sentences.sContent: An important factor that the researchers took note of was the participants' handedness.
sentences.sContent_eng: An important factor that the researchers took note of was the participants' handedness.
sentences.sCn: 研究人员考察的一个重要因素是参与者的用手习惯。

words.tran: 便利的；手边的，就近的；容易取得的；敏捷的
无手的；笨手笨脚的；赤手空拳的

trans.tranOther: the tendency to use one hand more skilfully or in preference to the other
